content: ✔︎ pattern 034 - the vee beanie pattern ✔︎ features a unique button tab ✔︎ patterns are written in standard american terms ✔︎ rated easy ✔︎ must have knowledge of basic stitches & how to read a crochet pattern ✔︎ the pattern has been thoroughly tested for accuracy ✔︎ pattern is adult one size fits most ✔︎ the hat is crocheted with chunky size 5 yarn ✔︎ recommended hook sizes are listed in the pattern however please use the appropriate hook size to meet gauge ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i am more than happy to help if you have any questions regarding the pattern please send me a message pattern and images are copyright protected and the sole property of simply made by erin the written pattern is for personal use only please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or images feel free to do what you like with the finished product but please credit me as the designer you may copy and paste the following information to your product pattern designed by simply made by erin www simplymadebyerin com www facebook com/simplymadebyerin www instagram com/simplymadebyerin
